channel.title: Adding, Moving, Changing?
channel.description:
hey guys, im brand new at this coding and im in for a try so id like to know a few things
#1. how do i move npc`s around so like shops and i know monsters arent npc`s but them to.
#2. id like to know how to add/remove items to shops
#3. how do i add add npc`s? i mean id like to add a few monsters and some shops
#4. how do i change the start kit? so when the characters log on i can chose what armour they have on/what items they have for a ::Starter or have already got it when logged in
if anyone can add 1 or more questions that whould be awesome and very handy
thanks, lewis.

item.title: Adding, Moving, Changing?
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

[quote=“r34p4g3pk, post:11, topic:254524”]There’s a magic topic in the forums called tutorials, check there before posting this.[/quote] guess what, i have.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2009, 06:57:08 pm[/size][hr][quote=“moh, post:10, topic:254524”]#1. Go to AutoSpawn Find Npc id Change Coords.

#2. Go to Autospawn Add new Shop Or replace it go to shops.config add new shop and items.

#3. Agian AutoSpawn Get Npc id Just add Then Set coords.

#4. add this to your client:

if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(1321, 1);
addItem(1189, 1);
addItem(556, 5000);
addItem(557, 1000);
addItem(558, 1000);
addItem(555, 1000);
addItem(554, 1000);
addItem(562, 1000);
addItem(841, 1);
addItem(882, 500);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(5698, 1);
addItem(3101, 1);
addItem(430, 1);
addItem(3753, 1);
addItem(1079, 1);
addItem(995, 25000000);
}

You can Change The items And Amout of it If you need More Help send me a message
Moh [/quote] thanks helped alot.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding, Moving, Changing?
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

#1. Go to AutoSpawn Find Npc id Change Coords.

#2. Go to Autospawn Add new Shop Or replace it go to shops.config add new shop and items.

#3. Agian AutoSpawn Get Npc id Just add Then Set coords.

#4. add this to your client:

if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(1321, 1);
addItem(1189, 1);
addItem(556, 5000);
addItem(557, 1000);
addItem(558, 1000);
addItem(555, 1000);
addItem(554, 1000);
addItem(562, 1000);
addItem(841, 1);
addItem(882, 500);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(5698, 1);
addItem(3101, 1);
addItem(430, 1);
addItem(3753, 1);
addItem(1079, 1);
addItem(995, 25000000);
}

You can Change The items And Amout of it If you need More Help send me a message
Moh

Read full topic
